mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qnano, memberno, seqno, title, content, choice, grpno, indent, ansnum, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(qnano), 0) + 1 as qnano FROM qna), #{memberno}, #{seqno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{choice}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(grpno), 0) + 1 as grpno FROM qna), #{ansnum}, #{indent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT qnano, memberno,seqno, title, content, choice, grpno, indent, ansnum, rdate FROM qna ORDER BY grpno DESC, ansnum ASC
